basics.name: Suman Jayapathi
basics.label: Team Lead - Engineering at Xero
basics.summary:
I am a Team Lead/Engineering Manager with 10+ years experience across Fintech, energy and consulting. I've worked with iOS, .NET, Kubernetes and AWS and I now enjoy systems thinking and coaching people.

I am an active proponent of using automation to reduce toil for my fellow engineers, with a soft spot for standardised tooling and CI/CD. I love working with cross-disciplinary teams to create and deliver outcome-oriented roadmaps for mobile and web products.

My personal project is about self-hosting open source apps on a kubernetes cluster on my homelab using GitOps.

work.name: Xero
work.summary: People leadership was new to me, so I worked on it by being a process wonk and relying on data.
highlights: Introduced an engineering capability matrix so that engineers had the right skillsets to deliver on the mobile roadmap.
Hired and grew 3 product teams; streamlined the hiring process and learnt how to manage vendors for contracting.
Established quality and delivery practices for engineers based on Accelerate principles and DORA metrics.
Represented engineering on strategy roll-out, driving the design and deployment of a prioritisation framework across 6 teams.

work.name: Xero
work.summary: As one of the more experienced engineers, I brought technical leadership and customer-focus to a newly established mobile team.
highlights: Mentored mobile engineers through the migration of a large codebase from Objective C to Swift 2.
Created a containerised tool for path-to-production compliance that was adopted across the organisation.
Led a Python community of practice to spread awareness and encourage adoption of Python at Xero

work.name: CitiPower and Powercor
highlights: Built an augmented reality app using geo-spatial data to overlay overhead and underground cabling specs for field crew
Developed an OH&S app using iBeacon (iOS) technology, which was recognised for championing a core cultural value of the organisation.

work.name: Liberty Financial Pty Ltd
work.summary: Liberty is a low-doc lender that pioneered mobile apps for brokers to evaluate and submit mortgage applications.
highlights: Foundationary member of iOS development at Liberty, which resulted in Liberty's nomination for Best Innovator at Australian Lending Awards in 2013.
Set up continuous integration for iOS development.

volunteer.summary: Basketball team in the Melbourne East Basketball Association league.
highlights: Team made it to the Grand Finals of the Winter Season 2022

volunteer.summary: Teaching 9-10 year old students about safety and health through cycling.
highlights: Coached year 4 students through a 50km cycling expedition.

projects.name: Okoo
projects.description: A childcare management application that provided childcare centre managers and on-call workers with a mobile and user-friendly way to manage their rosters.
highlights: Experimented with and adopted Fastlane to simplify CI

projects.name: SuperSportVideos
projects.description: Online store for marathon runners to get their personalised video snippets of completing the marathon
highlights: Automated creation of AWS EC2 instances to run ffmpeg in parallel for video processing.
Python services to publish products to Shopify
